SQLDataSource.Author: DELL
SQLDataSource.Name: MATERIALS_READ_TO_ASSIGN
SQLDataSource.Where:
wo_no IN (SELECT wo_no FROM (SELECT DISTINCT t.wo_no, t.task_seq, &AO.Active_Separate_API.Get_Reg_Date(t.wo_no) as reg_date, &AO.Jt_Task_API.Get_Contract_Id(t.task_seq) as contract_id, &AO.Crm_Cust_Info_API.Get_Main_Representative_Id(&AO.Jt_Task_API.Get_Customer_No(t.task_seq)) as main_rep FROM &AO.jt_task_uiv_cfv t WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM &AO.maint_material_req_line_uiv WHERE wo_no = t.wo_no AND task_seq = t.task_seq AND ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM &AO.maint_material_req_line_uiv a WHERE a.task_seq = t.task_seq AND a.wo_no = t.wo_no AND a.task_seq IS NOT NULL) = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM &AO.maint_material_req_line_uiv a WHERE a.task_seq = t.task_seq AND a.qty_assigned = a.plan_qty AND a.wo_no = t.wo_no AND a.task_seq IS NOT NULL))) AND t.task_seq NOT IN (SELECT task_seq FROM &AO.JT_EXECUTION_INSTANCE_UIV) AND &AO.Sc_Service_Contract_API.Get_Contract_Type(&AO.Jt_Task_API.Get_Contract_Id(t.task_seq)) = 'MS') WHERE reg_date >= TO_DATE(NVL('$BEGIN_DATE$', '01/01/1900'), 'dd/mm/yyyy') AND reg_date <= TO_DATE(NVL('$END_DATE$', '31/12/2999') || ' 11:59:59 PM', 'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mi:ss pm') AND REPLACE(NVL(contract_id, ' '), ' ', '%') LIKE REPLACE(NVL('$CONTRACT_ID$', ' '), ' ', '%')
AND REPLACE(NVL(main_rep, ' '), ' ', '%') LIKE REPLACE(NVL('$REGION_REPRESENTATIVE$', ' '), ' ', '%'))
